actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide for the consideration of construction work in progress, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide that the cost of construction work in progress shall be included in the rate base used to establish electric utility rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide for the consideration of construction work in progress, and for other purposes.
